riool-ontstoppen.title: Drain unblocking
riool-ontstoppen.description: Fast and professional drain unblocking with professional equipment. 24/7 emergency service available.

0.description: We locate the blockage and determine the cause

1.description: Professional unblocking with high-pressure cleaning or drain snake

0.q: How quickly can you arrive for an emergency?
0.a: For emergencies, we're often on-site within 1-2 hours. We're available 24/7.

1.q: What are common causes of a blocked drain?
1.a: Grease and soap buildup, hair, wet wipes, root growth and limescale are the most common causes.

2.a: On average 30-60 minutes, depending on the severity and location of the blockage.

wc-ontstoppen.title: Toilet unblocking
wc-ontstoppen.description: Blocked toilet? We fix it quickly and hygienically. No mess, no hassle.

0.description: We determine the nature and location of the blockage

1.description: Expert unblocking with the right method

2.description: Everything is left clean and hygienic

0.a: A standard toilet unblocking costs €99. For emergencies outside office hours, an emergency rate of €149 applies.

1.q: Can you unblock all types of toilets?
1.a: Yes, we have experience with all types of toilets, including wall-hung and older models.

2.q: How do I prevent a blocked toilet?
2.a: Only flush toilet paper and avoid wet wipes. Regularly flushing with hot water also helps.

afvoer-ontstoppen.title: Drain clearing
afvoer-ontstoppen.description: Blocked drain in bathroom, shower or sink? We'll clear it right away.

benefits.0: Solution for all types of drains

0.description: We determine where the blockage is located

1.description: The blockage is removed with drain snake or high-pressure

3.description: We verify that the water drains properly

0.a: All drains: shower, sink, bathtub, washing machine drain and floor drains.

1.q: How long does drain clearing take?
1.a: Usually 15-30 minutes per drain, depending on the blockage.

2.a: For minor blockages you can try a plunger. If the water won't drain, call a professional to prevent damage.

rioolreiniging.title: Sewer cleaning
rioolreiniging.description: Preventive sewer cleaning and maintenance. Prevent blockages and extend the lifespan of your pipes.

benefits.1: Removes grease, limescale and dirt buildup
benefits.2: Extends the lifespan of your sewer system

0.description: We assess the condition of your sewer system

3.description: Advice on maintenance and any points of attention

0.q: How often should a sewer be cleaned?
0.a: We recommend preventive cleaning every 2-3 years. For businesses with heavy grease discharge, more frequent cleaning may be needed.

1.q: Is sewer cleaning suitable for businesses?
1.a: Yes, we clean sewers for both individuals and businesses, hospitality and property managers.

2.q: Will I notice a difference after cleaning?
2.a: Yes, water drains faster and odour nuisance disappears. It also prevents future blockages.

rioolinspectie.title: Sewer inspection
rioolinspectie.description: Camera inspection of your sewer system. Detecting leaks, cracks, subsidence or root growth.

benefits.0: Exact location of problems on screen
benefits.1: Detects cracks, root growth and subsidence
benefits.3: Ideal when buying a home or for recurring problems

0.description: Camera equipment is prepared and tested

1.description: HD camera is guided through the sewer system

2.description: Direct assessment of the condition of your pipes

3.description: You receive a report with images and advice

0.q: When is a sewer inspection needed?
0.a: For recurring blockages, odour nuisance, when buying a home, or when you want to know the condition of your sewer.

1.q: How long does a sewer inspection take?
1.a: On average 30-45 minutes, depending on the length and accessibility of the pipes.

2.a: Yes, you receive a comprehensive report with photos and optionally video recordings.

rioolreparatie.title: Sewer repair
rioolreparatie.description: Repair of damaged sewer systems. From minor leaks to complete pipe replacement.

0.description: Camera inspection to pinpoint the damage

1.description: Clear quote with explanation of the work

2.description: Expert repair or replacement of the pipe

3.description: Final check for watertightness and flow

0.q: How do I recognise a broken sewer?
0.a: Recurring blockages, odour nuisance, wet spots in the garden or subsidence of paving can indicate sewer damage.

1.q: Does the garden need to be dug up?
1.a: Not always. For minor damage, relining can sometimes be applied without excavation.

2.q: How long does a sewer repair take?
2.a: A local repair usually takes 1 day. For larger jobs, this can be 2-3 days.

hemelwaterafvoer.title: Rainwater & Drainage
hemelwaterafvoer.description: Cleaning and maintenance of rain drains. Solving and preventing water damage.

benefits.0: Prevents water damage during heavy rainfall
benefits.1: Cleaning of gutters, drains and pipes
benefits.2: Quick response for acute water damage

0.description: We check gutters, drains and pipes

2.description: Removing leaves, dirt and root growth

0.q: How often should a rainwater drain be cleaned?
0.a: We recommend at least once a year, preferably in autumn after leaf fall.

1.q: What if there's water in my basement?
1.a: Call us immediately. We offer 24/7 emergency service for acute water damage.

2.q: Can root growth block a rainwater drain?
2.a: Yes, roots from trees and shrubs are a common cause. We remove them and advise on prevention.

keukenafvoer-ontstoppen.title: Kitchen drain unblocking
keukenafvoer-ontstoppen.description: Kitchen drain blocked by grease or food waste? We'll clear it quickly.

0.description: We examine the drain and identify the blockage

1.description: Removing grease, food waste and dirt

3.description: Advice on grease traps and proper use

0.q: Why does my kitchen drain keep getting blocked?
0.a: Usually due to buildup of grease, food waste and soap. A grease trap or regularly flushing with hot water helps.

1.q: Can I unblock a kitchen drain myself?
1.a: For minor blockages you can try hot water with baking soda. For stubborn blockages, professional help is needed.

2.a: Yes, especially for intensive cooking or in hospitality, a grease trap is very effective.

douche-ontstoppen.title: Shower unblocking
douche-ontstoppen.description: Blocked shower? Hair, soap and limescale cleared quickly. Clean and hygienic approach.

benefits.1: Removal of hair, soap and limescale residue

0.description: We determine the cause of the blockage

0.a: Usually buildup of hair, soap and limescale in the drain. A hair filter can largely prevent this.

1.a: A shower unblocking takes on average 15-30 minutes.

2.a: For minor blockages you can try a plunger or baking soda with vinegar. If it doesn't help, call a professional.

hoofdriolering-ontstoppen.title: Main sewer unblocking
hoofdriolering-ontstoppen.description: Blockage in the main sewer? We fix it with professional high-pressure equipment.

benefits.0: Powerful high-pressure cleaning for main pipes
benefits.2: Prevents water damage to multiple homes

0.description: Locating the blockage in the main pipe

2.description: The entire pipe is flushed through

0.a: The main sewer is the central drainage pipe that connects all drains in your home to the municipal sewer.

1.q: How do I recognise a blockage in the main sewer?
1.a: Multiple drains running slowly at the same time, gurgling toilets or odour nuisance indicate a blockage in the main pipe.

2.q: Is this more expensive than a regular unblocking?
2.a: The main sewer requires heavier equipment, hence the higher price. The exact cost depends on the situation.

preventieve-rioolreiniging.title: Preventive sewer cleaning
preventieve-rioolreiniging.description: Prevent blockages with regular sewer cleaning. Removal of grease, limescale and dirt buildup.

benefits.1: Removes grease, limescale and dirt buildup
benefits.2: Extends the lifespan of your sewer system

0.description: We assess the condition of your sewer system

3.description: Advice on maintenance and any points of attention

0.q: How often should a sewer be cleaned?
0.a: We recommend preventive cleaning every 2-3 years. For businesses with heavy grease discharge, more frequent cleaning may be needed.

1.a: Yes, we clean sewers for both individuals and businesses, hospitality and property managers.

2.q: Will I notice a difference after cleaning?
2.a: Yes, water drains faster and odour nuisance disappears. It also prevents future blockages.

periodiek-onderhoud.title: Periodic maintenance
periodiek-onderhoud.description: Regular maintenance of your sewer system prevents expensive repairs. Custom maintenance contracts.

benefits.2: Fixed appointments at a time that suits you
benefits.3: Suitable for homes, HOAs and commercial buildings

0.description: Together we create a maintenance schedule

1.description: Check the condition of your sewer system

3.description: Summary of work done and points of attention

0.q: Who is periodic maintenance suitable for?
0.a: For anyone who wants to prevent blockages: homeowners, HOAs, property managers and businesses.

1.a: Standard once a year, but we adjust the frequency to your situation and needs.

2.q: Can I cancel a maintenance contract?
2.a: Yes, our contracts are flexible and can be cancelled monthly.

doorspuiten-leidingen.title: Pipe flushing
doorspuiten-leidingen.description: Professional high-pressure flushing of drain pipes. For optimal flow.

benefits.0: Powerful high-pressure cleaning up to 200 bar
benefits.2: Suitable for all types of pipes
benefits.3: Can be used preventively and curatively

1.description: Pipes are cleaned under high pressure

0.q: What's the difference from regular unblocking?
0.a: Flushing preventively cleans the entire pipe, while unblocking targets a specific blockage.

1.a: No, our professionals work with the right pressure for each type of pipe. This is completely safe.

2.q: How long does pipe flushing take?
2.a: On average 30-60 minutes, depending on the length and number of pipes.

leidingvervanging.title: Pipe replacement
leidingvervanging.description: Damaged or outdated pipes? We replace them expertly with minimal disruption.

0.description: Camera inspection to map the damage

3.description: Final check and leaving the site tidy

0.q: When do pipes need to be replaced?
0.a: For recurring leaks, cracks, severe corrosion or when repair is no longer cost-effective.

1.q: Does the floor or garden need to be opened up?
1.a: Sometimes excavation is needed, but we keep it to a minimum. In some situations, trenchless technology is possible.

2.q: How long does pipe replacement take?
2.a: A simple replacement takes 1 day, larger projects can take 2-5 working days.

wateroverlast-oplossen.title: Water damage solutions
wateroverlast-oplossen.description: Water damage from heavy rainfall or blocked drains? We're on standby 24/7.

benefits.0: Quick response for acute water damage
benefits.1: Solution for basements, crawl spaces and gardens
benefits.2: Cleaning of gutters, drains and pipes

0.description: You call us and we come as soon as possible

1.description: We determine the cause of the water damage

3.description: Advice to prevent future water damage

0.q: How fast can you arrive for water damage?
0.a: For emergencies, we're often on-site within 1-2 hours. We're available 24/7.

1.a: Blocked rainwater drains, overloaded sewers during heavy rainfall, or faulty pumps.

2.q: Can you also repair the damage?
2.a: We solve the cause. For consequential damage, we advise you to contact your insurance.

regenpijp-ontstoppen.title: Downpipe unblocking
regenpijp-ontstoppen.description: Blocked downpipe? We'll clear it quickly and prevent water damage to your facade.

benefits.0: Prevents moisture damage to facades and foundations
benefits.2: Removal of leaves, dirt and moss growth

0.description: We determine the cause and location of the blockage

3.description: We verify the water drains properly

0.a: Usually buildup of leaves, moss, dirt or bird droppings. Trees nearby increase the risk.

1.q: How do I recognise a blocked downpipe?
1.a: Water running down the facade, overflowing gutters or puddles at the base of the downpipe are signs.

2.q: How often should a downpipe be cleaned?
2.a: We recommend at least once a year, preferably in autumn after leaf fall.
